sentences.sentence: When broadleaved species were planted only, the area percent of coniferous species was lower than the control.
sentences.translation: 随着阔叶树种造林比例的增加，阔叶树（蒙古栎）所占面积亦随之增加；

sentences.sentence: The controlling test was carried out to the annual and perennial broadleaved weed and shrub on forestland with 24% picloram Sc.
sentences.translation: 选用24%氨氯吡啶酸水剂，对林地一年生及多年生阔叶杂草、灌木进行防除试验。

sentences.sentence: The results showed that in 1985, mature broadleaved and coniferous forests occupied 68.52% of the forest resources, but in 1999, medium-age broadleaved and coniferous forests occupied 65.96%.
sentences.translation: 结果表明：1985年研究区森林资源本底为成熟阔叶林和成熟针叶林，二者联合比例为68.52%；1999年为中龄针叶林和成熟阔叶林，二者联合比例为65.96%。
